QuestData.Title: Ogre Thieves
QuestData.Description: A few weeks ago I was picking herbs far from my house, and a band of ogres attacked me! I ran, and I was forced to leave behind a crate of precious tools and herbs.$B$BAfter they chased me off, the ogres swaggered back to the ogre mound in southern Duskwood. I'm sure my crate is somewhere near the mound.$B$BPlease, $n, retrieve this crate for me for I miss it sorely.
QuestData.CompletionText: Do you have my crate? If so, then please...give it to me quickly!
QuestData.RewardText: Thank the Nec-...well, thank YOU, $n! You have more than earned your reward.$B$BAha! Happy! Happy nights ahead!!
